TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Healing Wave
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Totemic Focus
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Reincarnation
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by [@value2] min and increases the amount of health and mana you reincarnate with by an additional [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Healing Grace
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the threat generated by your Shaman healing spells by [@value]% and reduces the chance your helpfull Shaman spells and damage over time effects will be dispelled by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Tidal Focus
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Shaman healing spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Water Shield
TalentsTiers.Description: You have a [@value]% chance to instantly gain mana as if u consumed a Water Shield Orb, when you gain a critical effect from your Healing Wave or Riptide spells, [@value2]% chance when yougain a critical effect from your Lesser Healing Wave spell and a [@value3]% chance when you gain a critical effect from your Chain Heal spell.

TalentsTiers.Name: Healing Focus
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting any Shaman healing spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Tidal Force
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
3 min cooldown

Increases the critical effect chance of your Healing Wave, Lesser Healing Wave and Chain heal by 60%. Each critical heal reduces the chance by 20%. Lasts 20 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ancestral Healing
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces your target's physical damage taken by [@value]% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from one of your Shaman healing spells.

TalentsTiers.Name: Restorative Totems
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring Totem by [@value]% and increases the ammount healed by Healing Stream Totem by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Tidal Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Shaman healing and lightning spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Healing Way
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount healed by your Healing Wave spell and the instant healing of Riptide by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Natures Swiftness
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
2 min cooldown

When activated, your next Shaman Nature spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell. Nature's Swiftness shares a cooldown with Elemental Mastery.

TalentsTiers.Name: Focused Mind
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effects used against the Shaman by [@value]%. This effect does not stack with other similar effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Purification
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effectiveness of your Nature healing spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Natures Guardian
TalentsTiers.Description: Whenever a damaging attack brings you below 30% health, your maximum health is increased by [@value]% for 10 sec. and your threat level towards the attacker is reduced. 30 second cooldown.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mana Tide Totem
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
5 min cooldown

Tools: Water Totem
Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 10% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec that restores 6% of total mana every 3 seconds to group members within 30 yards.

TalentsTiers.Name: Cleanse Spirit
TalentsTiers.Description:
6% of base mana
40 yd range

Instant Cast
Cleanse the spirit of a friendly target, removing 1 poison effect, 1 disease effect, and 1 curse effect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Blessing of the Eternals
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical effect chance of your spells by [@value]%, and increases the chance to apply the Earthliving heal over time effect on the target by [@value2]% when they are at or under 35% total health.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Chain Heal
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount healed by your Chain Heal spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Natures Blessing
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your healing by an amount equal to [@value]% of your Intellect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ancestral Awakening
TalentsTiers.Description: When you critically heal with your Healing Wave, Lesser Healing Wave or Riptide you summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing the lowest percentage health friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for [@value]% of the amount healed.

TalentsTiers.Name: Earth Shield
TalentsTiers.Description:
12% of base mana
40 yd range

Instant Cast
Protects the target with an earthen shield, reducing casting or channeling time lost when damaged by 30% and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for 150. This effect can only occur once every few seconds. 6 charges. Lasts 10 min. Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Earth Shield
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount of charges for your Earth Shield by [@value], and increases the healing done by your Earth Shield by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Tidal Waves
TalentsTiers.Description: When you cast Chain Heal or Riptide, you have a [@value] % chance to lower the cast time of your Healing wave spell by 30% and increase the critical effect chance of your Lesser Healing Wave spell by 25%. In addition, your Healing Wave gains an additional [@value2]% of your bonus healing effects and your Lesser Healing Wave gains an additional [@value3]% of your bonus healing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Riptide
TalentsTiers.Description:
15% of base mana
40 yd range

Instant Cast
6 sec cooldown

Heals a friendly target for 639 to 691 and another 500 over 15 sec. Your next Chain heal cast on that primary target within 15 sec will consume the healing over time effect and increase the amount of the Chain Heal by 25%.
